page.title: 07HEALTH
page.content: In our block we have helping services,such as Raby Hall and a Doctors surgery.Here is what we found out. {Raby Hall}is a home for the Autistic people.There are twenty three residents and sixteen helpers.They work at crafts and they have a holiday cottage in Wales. At the doctors surgery there are eleven thousand five hundred patients in the books.They have five doctors there,who take of outside and inside calls. Our vets opens at nine o' clock and closes at five o'clock.He treats small animals like our school guinea pigs and the odd goat.They are open seven days a week.
